data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mathis, Wayne N., Zatwarnicki, Tadeusz, Marris, John W. M. (2004): Review of unreported shore­fly genera of the tribe Scatellini from the New Zealand subregion (Diptera: Ephydridae) with description of three new species. Zootaxa 622: 1-27, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.158576
